name: Sundarbans Mangrove Forest
description: Explore the enchanting Sundarbans, a UNESCO World Heritage Site known for its rich biodiversity and the elusive Bengal Tiger. Cruise through its intricate waterways, spot unique wildlife.
price: $150 per person for a day tour

name: Cox's Bazar Beach
description: Discover the world's longest natural sea beach at Cox's Bazar. Stroll along the golden sands, enjoy beachside activities, and relish fresh seafood at local shacks. A perfect destination for beach lovers.

name: Sajek Valley
description: Sajek Valley, perched in the Chittagong Hill Tracts, offers panoramic views of lush green landscapes and serene villages. Hike through the hills, interact with indigenous tribes, and camp under the starry sky.
price: $70 per night for a hillside cottage

name: Rangamati
description: Rangamati is a scenic hill district with a serene lake, perfect for boating and water sports. Visit tribal villages, enjoy the Chakma handicrafts, and relish the tranquility amidst hills.
price: $60 per night for a lakeside retreat

name: Kuakata Sea Beach
description: Kuakata is known as the 'Daughter of the Sea.' It offers a unique view of both sunrise and sunset over the Bay of Bengal. Relax on the unspoiled beach and enjoy the tranquil ambience.
price: $75 per night for a beachside cottage

name: Sundari Cholon Island
description: This hidden gem in the Bay of Bengal is a paradise for snorkeling and diving enthusiasts. Crystal-clear waters, vibrant marine life, and untouched coral reefs await those who seek adventure.
price: $120 for a day of snorkeling and diving

name: Saint Martin's Island
description: Saint Martin's, the only coral island in Bangladesh, is a tropical paradise. Explore pristine beaches, enjoy fresh seafood, and snorkel to discover colorful corals and marine life.

name: Paharpur Buddhist Vihara
description: Immerse yourself in the historical marvel of Paharpur Vihara, an ancient Buddhist monastery. Explore the archaeological site and learn about the rich Buddhist heritage of Bangladesh.
price: $20 for a guided tour and cultural experience
